title: Digital Version of Tabasco Font?
content:
I can find "Tabasco" in my old Letraset catalog.

But searching the web, I can find no digital version.

Except for a couple really crappy free versions

Does anyone know if it is available under a different name or something?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628040839im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hord_logo_4442.gif)
author: Robby Woodard

comments.content:
[Tavrida](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628040839/http:/paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?fcode=SU_TVR&letter=T) from Paratype is the only digitization I know of.

- Lex

Thanks, Lex! I never would have found that.

– R\V
